caption.p: Alteration in surface structure due to the yjbI and the yjbH genes disruption. (a). Surface protein profiles of the strains. Surface proteins were extracted from the respective strains and applied to a 4â€“20% gradient SDS-PAGE gel and visualized by CBB staining. M: Molecular weight marker. (b). FTIR spectral profiling of cell envelope glycostructures. FTIR spectroscopy-based dendrogram (HCA) of wild-type, yjbH::Tn, and yjbI::Tn, each comprising triplicate measurements at three different days (upper). Average spectra were generated from the second derivative, vector-normalized FTIR spectra. Black: wild-type, orange: yjbH::Tn, red: yjbI::Tn (lower)
